name: Loot Quest:Rivals
description:
This was a prototype game created at our college by a team of 4 including myself.

The game will be a 2D style dungeon crawler with a scrolling background that will feature 2Players fighting different style enemy npcs from creatures of the forest to your typical dungeon monsters like skeletons, slimes and imps. The game will feature a forest area, cave and main dungeon with a treasure room at the end.

Credit:

Derek Cormier - Gameplay Programmer

Lewis Falconer - UI Programmer

Teresa Brown - Project Lead

Damien Cochran - Lead Artist
